vocabularies.name: a bank account
vocabularies.meaning: is a financial account maintained by a bank or other financial institution in which financial transactions between the bank and a customer are recorded.

vocabularies.name: balance
vocabularies.meaning: the amount of money you have in a bank account.

vocabularies.name: bank customer services assistant
vocabularies.meaning: a person employed in a bank to serve customers

vocabularies.name: brochure
vocabularies.meaning: a type of small magazine that contains pictures and information on a product.

vocabularies.name: checking account
vocabularies.meaning: a bank account that you can take  money from at any time.
